channel.title: Raptr rewards giveaway!
channel.description:
Hey guys, I recently got rewards from the program/website called Raptr, seeing as how I won't be able to use them I thought I would give these away. Message me if you are interested in what rewards you would like down below (first come, first served).
The rewards are:
* Pandora Saga Starter Boost Pack (expires in 15 hours) * 60% off Logitech Modern Warfare 3 Peripherals (expires in 15 hours) * Pandora Saga Rare Mount Pack (expires in 15 hours) * Free 1 Month of Xbox Live Gold AND 2 Xbox Live Arcade Games (UK) (expires in 15 hours) * 60% off Logitech Modern Warfare 3 Peripherals (EU) (expires 7/8/2012) * 35% off Logitech G-Series peripherals (EU) (expires 7/8/2012) * Spirit Tales Jump Start Pack (expires 7/22/2012) * Warhammer Online: Wrath of Heroes free Wood Chest (expires 8/22/2012) * Warhammer Online: Wrath of Heroes Free XP Boost (expires 8/12/2012) * Lost Saga Hardcore Gear & Peso Pack (expires 9/21/2012) * Lost Saga Starter Pack (9/21/2012) * Lost Saga Elite Hero Scroll & Boosts Pack (expires 9/21/2012) * Lost Saga Experienced Boost Pack (expires 9/21/2012) * Lost Saga Dedicated Cash & Style Pack (expires 9/21/2012) * Blacklight: Retribution Jump Start Package (expires 4/10/2013) * Blacklight: Retribution Veteran Package (expires 4/10/2013)

item.title: Raptr rewards giveaway!
item.dc:creator: OogaBooga
item.description:
I would like to do the Logitech peripherals but I don’t have the money and by the time I do, it will be too late and the reward would expire. So I thought to just give it away to you guys.

Read full topic

item.title: Raptr rewards giveaway!
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
None of those do any good for me. Cool of you to give these away though.

Read full topic

item.title: Raptr rewards giveaway!

item.description:
